name: Ace Aura
description: '''Eric Joshua Seall''' (born September 10, 1998), known professionally as '''Ace Aura''', is an American DJ, music producer and remixer from [[McKinney, Texas]]. He is known as a pioneer of the melodic riddim subgenre, which is characterized by the minimalistic rhythmic elements of [[Riddim (genre)|riddim]], with a heavy emphasis on chords, melodies and experimental sounds. He has released five EPs, along with numerous singles and official remixes for record labels including [[Monstercat]], [[Circus Records]], [[Dim Mak Records]], [[Buygore]], [[Ophelia Records]], [[Trap Nation|Lowly]], Disciple and [[Never Say Die Records]]. He has performed at music festivals and venues across [[North America]] and [[Australia]], including [[Electric Zoo]], [[Banc of California Stadium]], [[Legend Valley]], [[Red Rocks Amphitheater]], [[Bill Graham Civic Auditorium]], the [[Saltair (Utah)|Great Saltair]], the [[Hollywood Palladium]], the [[Mission Ballroom]] and the [[Ogden Theatre]].
